EmailTemplate.subject: How to gain an ‘EDGE’ in convenience stores
EmailTemplate.textOnly: Webinar Sept 21st 2pm EST: Giving Convenience Stores an ‘EDGE’ Hi {{lead.First Name:default=valued customer}}, Join me with our expert panel to learn how ‘Edge Virtualization’ is disrupting the traditional c-store infrastructure, including a look at the latest technology that will enable ‘continuous operations’ at the pump and in the store – saving huge costs. Now is the time to enable c-stores to manage, monitor and maintain their stores more efficiently, together with the agility to pivot quickly and adapt for change.
